Package control.admin

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
control.admin.AdminController
public class AdminController extends Object
AdminController class is used to control the admin functions It provides methods for managing staff, branches, and payment methods
Since:
2024-04-26
Version:
1.0
Author:
Denzel Elden Wijaya, Federrico Hansen Budianto, Melisa Lee, Rivaldo Billy Sebastian

    • transferStaff

      public static void transferStaff(Staff staff, String branchKey) throws StaffExistException, AddStaffException
      Transfers a staff member to another branch.
      Parameters:
      staff - The staff object to be transferred.
      branchKey - The key of the branch to which the staff is to be transferred.
      Throws:
      StaffExistException - If the staff already exists.
      AddStaffException - If an error occurs while adding staff.

    • assignStaff

      public static void assignStaff(Staff staff, Role role, Branch branch) throws StaffExistException, AddStaffException
      Assigns a staff member to a specific role and branch.
      Parameters:
      staff - The staff object to be assigned.
      role - The role object to which the staff is to be assigned.
      branch - The branch object to which the staff is to be assigned.
      Throws:
      StaffExistException - If the staff already exists.
      AddStaffException - If an error occurs while adding staff.

    • addStaff

      public static void addStaff(Staff staff, Branch branch) throws StaffExistException, AddStaffException
      Adds a staff member to the specified branch.
      Parameters:
      staff - The staff object to be added.
      branch - The branch object to which the staff is to be added.
      Throws:
      StaffExistException - If the staff already exists.
      AddStaffException - If an error occurs while adding staff.

    • deleteStaff

      public static void deleteStaff(Staff staff)
      Deletes a staff member.
      Parameters:
      staff - The staff object to be deleted.

    • editStaffName

      public static void editStaffName(Staff staff, String name) throws BranchNotExistException, StaffExistException, AddStaffException
      Edits the username of a staff member.
      Parameters:
      staff - The staff object whose username is to be edited.
      name - The new username of the staff.
      Throws:
      BranchNotExistException - If the branch does not exist.
      StaffExistException - If the staff already exists.
      AddStaffException - If the staff cannot be added.

    • editStaffId

      public static void editStaffId(Staff staff, String Id) throws BranchNotExistException, StaffExistException, AddStaffException
      Edits the ID of a staff member.
      Parameters:
      staff - The staff object whose ID is to be edited.
      Id - The new ID of the staff.
      Throws:
      BranchNotExistException - If the branch does not exist.
      StaffExistException - If the staff already exists.
      AddStaffException - If the staff cannot be added.

      Parameters:
      staff - The staff object
      role - The new role of the staff
      Throws:
      BranchNotExistException - If the branch does not exist

      AddStaffException - If the staff cannot be added

      Parameters:
      staff - The staff object whose branch is to be edited.
      branch - The new branch of the staff.
      Throws:
      StaffExistException - If the staff already exists.
      AddStaffException - If the staff cannot be added.

    • promoteStaff

      public static void promoteStaff(Staff staff) throws PromotionException, BranchNotExistException, StaffExistException, AddStaffException
      Promotes a staff member to a higher role.
      Parameters:
      staff - The staff object to be promoted.
      Throws:
      PromotionException - If the staff cannot be promoted.
      BranchNotExistException - If the branch does not exist.
      StaffExistException - If the staff already exists.
      AddStaffException - If the staff cannot be added.

    • openBranch

      public static void openBranch(Branch branch) throws BranchExistsException
      Opens a new branch.
      Parameters:
      branch - The branch object representing the new branch to be opened.
      Throws:
      BranchExistsException - If the branch already exists.

    • closeBranch

      Parameters:
      branch - The branch object representing the branch to be closed.
      Throws:
      CloseBranchException - If the branch cannot be closed.
